contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Ussy |image = Eglise d'Ussy.JPG |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Falaise-Nord |INSEE = 14720 |postal code = 14420 |mayor = FranÃ§oise Kedziora |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Pays de Falaise |longitude = -0.2819 |latitude = 48.9481 |elevation m = 178 |elevation min m = 124 |elevation max m = 200 |area km2 = 8.68 |population = 847 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Ussy}} '''Ussy''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1793|749 |1800|831 |1806|869 |1821|890 |1831|753 |1836|778 |1841|800 |1846|828 |1851|830 |1856|855 |1861|860 |1866|869 |1872|801 |1876|832 |1881|780 |1886|805 |1891|743 |1896|743 |1901|755 |1906|779 |1911|813 |1921|706 |1926|700 |1931|707 |1936|620 |1946|619 |1954|668 |1962|709 |1968|677 |1975|638 |1982|627 |1990|717 |1999|755 |2006|831 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/fr/bases-de-donnees/esl/comparateur.asp?codgeo=COM-14720 INSEE statistics] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
